entry.tran: （费用）高得令很多人负担不起的，贵得让人望而却步的
entry.def: If the cost of something is prohibitive, it is so high that many people cannot afford it.

example.ex: The cost of private treatment can be prohibitive.
example.tran: 自费治疗的费用高得让人望而却步。

example.ex: ...the prohibitive prices charged for seats at the opera.
